name: SLIMES STRONGER TOGETHER
description:
Very short plateformer for brakeys game jam 2021.1, I made everything in 10 hours, too bad i didn't had more time for this jam.  The camera is a little buggy sometimes, and there are other little bugs to fix. Still, I hope you'll enjoy it. At least i've done everything myself.

The goal is to get little slimes to be faster and bigger and to overcome the challenges.

ZQSD or Arrow keys to move

Space to jump

You can split and retrieve your original size with Ctrl and press it again to get bigger

R to reset in case you're stuck

Have fun
